sentences.en: But, of the vertebrates, unpredictable Nature selected only snakes ( and one lizard ).
sentences.cn: 但是, 在脊椎动物中, 神秘莫测的大自然只选择了蛇 ( 和一种蜥蜴 ).

sentences.en: He is unpredictable, weeping one moment, laughing the next.
sentences.cn: 他喜怒无常，一会儿哭，一会儿笑。
他做的决定难以预料, 主观武断.

sentences.en: His actions since that morning have been eccentric and unpredictable.
sentences.cn: 自从那天早晨,他的行动一直是反常而不可捉摸.

sentences.en: His behavior grew more unpredictable by the day, and increasingly tyrannical.
sentences.cn: 他的行为越来越难以捉摸，而且愈发残暴。

sentences.en: I find it difficult to rub along with Paul , he is so unpredictable.
sentences.cn: 我觉得和保罗很不好相处, 他这个人深不可测.

sentences.en: No-one knows where they stand with him; he is utterly unpredictable.
sentences.cn: 谁也不知道他怎样看待他们；他是个完全不可捉摸的人。

sentences.en: She was unpredictable, explosive, impulsive and easily distracted.
sentences.cn: 她难以捉摸，脾气暴躁，冲动鲁莽，容易分心。

sentences.en: Take waterproof clothing — Orkney weather is unpredictable.
sentences.cn: 带上防水的衣服吧——奥克尼的天气可是变幻莫测的。
结果是完全无法预料的。

sentences.en: The weather grew harsh, chilly and unpredictable.
sentences.cn: 天气变得恶劣、寒冷且变化莫测。

sentences.en: There were so many unpredictable fluctuations on the Stock Exchange.

sentences.cn: 你这人反复无常，真叫人难以捉摸。

words.tran_cn: 无法预言地）；不可预见地（不能预料地
不可预测性，不可预知性；不可预见性
不可预知的；不定的；出乎意料的

trans.tran_cn: 无法预言的，不可预测的
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone or something as unpredictable, you mean that you cannot tell what they are going to do or how they are going to behave
